author: Malarne (Malarne#1418)
description:
A leveler cog for Red V3
Inspired by Stevy's v2 leveler cog
Please consult the docs at ayrobot.netlify.com for setup informations.
Thanks for using my cog !
NB:Channel whitelist is enabled by default, you can manage that under `[p]levelerset channel whitelist` command !
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this leveler !
Please consult the docs at https://discord-cogs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/leveler.html for setup informations.
Please note that this cog come with bundled data, mostly the font for profile image.
